resources.string: Safely share anything with\nanyone or everyone.
Embrace your interests by creating\nand sharing in groups.
You are the sole owner of your information and content.
We don\'t share your personal information with anyone.
You control your permissions, privacy, and who can access your content.
You control what others see in public searches.
We do not monitor your \"likes\" or your data.
We do not use facial recognition technology.
We do not use tracking cookies.
We do not spy on your contact list.
You have the right to delete your account and take your content any time.
